Community¶

Below follow instructions on how to contribute and report issues with Learning Simulator. See also the Learning Simulator Project’s web page.

Contribute¶

We welcome contributions from anyone via pull requests on the GitHub repository. If you don’t feel comfortable modifying or adding functionality, we also welcome feature requests in emails to learningsimulator@gmail.com.

Questions, issues or problems¶

We welcome bug reports, as well as questions and ideas about Learning Simulator, in emails to learningsimulator@gmail.com.
